package.name: Jin's iDobe
package.shortDescription: Based from Adobe icons, variety of customizations

descriptionlist.description: It will include more icons and variations, such as Dark/OLED background, no-border edition, etc.
Recommend setting the Custom Border Radius into 0.
To check my work status go here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_uuoz4TZHCzT6mYfjPJWtM8wnNkrnqvO8pvEaLcHGTA/
